      • countMembers

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public int countMembers(Long groupId)
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Return the number of direct members of a group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - the ID of the group whose members should be counted
        Returns:
        the number of direct members

      • getUsersOfGroup

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public Collection<Long> getUsersOfGroup(Long groupId,
                                                                      String externalSystemId)
                                                               throws GroupNotFoundException
        Return all IDs of users who are direct members of a given group.
        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of the group.
        externalSystemId - If set, only users of the given external system are considered.
        Returns:
        a list of all user IDs who are direct members of the given group.
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist

      • handleAddGroup

        protected void handleAddGroup(Long parentGroupId,
                              Long childGroupId)
                       throws GroupNotFoundException,
                              CantAddParentAsChildException,
                              AuthorizationException,
                              GroupOperationNotPermittedException
        Description copied from class: UserGroupMemberManagementBase
        Add a group to a group if it is not already contained.
        Specified by:
        handleAddGroup in class UserGroupMemberManagementBase
        Parameters:
        parentGroupId - ID of the target group the other group should be added to
        childGroupId - ID of the group to add
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the target group or the group to add does not exist
        CantAddParentAsChildException - in case adding the group would lead to a cyclic group hierarchy
        GroupOperationNotPermittedException - in case the target group is an external group
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not client manager

      • removeGroupFromAllExternalGroups

        @Transactional
public void removeGroupFromAllExternalGroups(Long groupId,
                                                            Collection<Long> groupIdsToIgnore)
                                                     throws GroupNotFoundException,
                                                            AuthorizationException
        Description copied from interface: UserGroupMemberManagement
        Remove an external group from all external groups of the same external system that contain this group as a direct member.
        Parameters:
        groupId - ID of the external group to remove from the other external groups
        groupIdsToIgnore - list of IDs of groups the group should not be removed from. Can be null.
        Throws:
        GroupNotFoundException - in case the group does not exist
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not the internal system user
